org.mini2Dx.core.controller.xbox360

Class Xbox360ControllerAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.core.controller.xbox360.Xbox360ControllerAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MdxControllerListener, Xbox360ControllerListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Xbox360UiInput

    public class Xbox360ControllerAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements Xbox360ControllerListener
    An overridable implementation of Xbox360ControllerListener

      • leftStickXMoved

        public boolean leftStickXMoved(Xbox360Controller controller,
                               float value)
        Description copied from interface: Xbox360ControllerListener
        Called when left stick moves along its X axis
        Specified by:
        leftStickXMoved in interface Xbox360ControllerListener
        Parameters:
        controller - The controller that this event came from
        value - ~-1f at left, ~0f at center, ~1f at right (values may never be accurate due to dead zones, apply a DeadZone to the controller instance to correct this)
        Returns:
        True if this event should not propagate to other listeners

      • leftStickYMoved

        Parameters:
        controller - The controller that this event came from
        value - ~-1f at top, ~0f at center, ~1f at bottom (values may never be accurate due to dead zones, apply a DeadZone to the controller instance to correct this)
        Returns:
        True if this event should not propagate to other listeners
